## Intro

This is a tutorial in R made for beginners. Use the menu to navigate to a 
section that you would like to practice, or move from topic to topic in a 
linear fashion as if you were reading a book. 

To get the most out of these exercises, run the code in the from your browser 
make sure that you understand it before moving on.

This is a work in progress. If you have questions, comments, or find any errors 
you can [contact me][email] or submit a [pull request][github]. Click 
'Next Topic' to continue.
